name: Delirious Demeanor of the Sacred Lord
description:
It was in that era that the first human to ascend arose from the throne to enter the Sacred Flame, while the mortal world awaited the arrival of their successor.
It was also the era that the mastermind took up the reins of all authority in their stead.
Unfortunately, this self-proclaimed Sacred Lord, this usurper who believed that the god he had loved and shed golden tears for should forever remain the one and only â€” overstepped his authority. Placing selfish desire above the commandments left by that revered god, he established a city in which the heavens and the earth were separated from one another.

items.name: Delirious Desolation of the Sacred Lord
